thread.title: TV | Fight Club

author: Brian Lloyd
title: TV | Fight Club
text: David Fincher's jet-black comedy trades on the inadequacy of men, pitching Brad Pitt and Ed Norton together in an explosive, bare-knuckle assault on the conventions of our consumerist society. A disillusioned office worker is growing weary of his humdrum existence, but after meeting the curious Tyler Durden he finds fulfilment in establishing a club where similarly frustrated people come to vent their anger in bouts of no-holds-barred combat. It does spiral off into farce at the expense of satire; nonetheless, Fight Club is still on of life's must-see movies.
